channel.title: I need more help, now that I have TestScape
channel.description:
How do I work TestScape? I downloaded the files, than when I try to compile it, it get this:
[code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
than if I try to use ""runserver", it opens for about half a second than closes.
Help!

item.title: I need more help, now that I have TestScape
item.dc:creator: @shawn333171 shawn333171
item.description:
@shawn333171 wrote:

i tried that one compile code and it doesnt work i get this problem
The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect.
How do you fix that?

Read full topic
item.source: I need more help, now that I have TestScape

item.title: I need more help, now that I have TestScape
item.dc:creator: @deltorz deltorz
item.description:
@deltorz wrote:

ok…first the ppl with the errors…
right click the compile file and delete everything is says and put in

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

then right click the runserver…delete everything, put in

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar serve

ok…

guy that wants rares…
phat-1038
phat-1040
phat-1042
phat-1044
phat-1046
(white)phat-1048

if you want noted just add 1 to the number[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 12:47:11 AM[/size][hr]rep me? ;D

Read full topic
